title: Monopoly ultimate banking / Monopoly voice banking
content:
I have considered buying these games but i've seen reviews about the monotony of them after a few games.

Is there any info about the technical details of these games like the microcontroller or hardware used, so i can consider dumping the firmware and modify it to change the rules for custom games.

Any hint where to find more info would be appreciated as well.

Regards.

comments.text: the manufacturer has the technical documents
it would probably be easier to build your own from scratch
